CustomField.description: This field identifies if the article/s related to the case have extra cover. This field will be used by Omni-Channel so that cases with extra cover are allocated the Extra Cover skill
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field identifies if the article/s related to the case have extra cover. This field will be used by Omni-Channel so that cases with extra cover are allocated the Extra Cover skill
CustomField.label: Linked Article Has Extra Cover
